page.title: 201985_OUR AREA
page.content:
The most popular sports for boys are football in winter and cricket in summer.In this area there is not much to do.{The Coppice}is the main feature of the area.It is a big hill.A by_pass from the M66 has cut through the Coppice.It has been called{the"highway {in the sky." } Our school was built in 1910 so this is our 75th Anniversary.Our school playing field is where {Accrington {Stanley Football Club }used to play.Accrington probably gets its name from a Saxon chief called Akeringa. {Huncoat}was mentioned in the original {Domesday Book.}
Andrew Dawson.
